dialog.user: Hi, I had a few questions about your hotel. Can you describe the rooms for me?
dialog.bot: Hi, welcome to the Embassy Suites by Hilton Convention Center Las Vegas customer service line. How may I assist you?

dialog.user: What amenities are available at the hotel?
dialog.bot: I certainly can. Each room has a balcony, minifridge and a kitchen. Our rooms have also been upgraded and are very modern.

dialog.user: That sounds nice. Where exactly are you located?
dialog.bot: Well, its a very contemporary and modern feel. We have a bar on sight and feature a swimming pool and hot tub available to our guests. Of course, you'll be treated to a free breakfast each morning as well.

dialog.user: Thank you, can I book a room with you now?
dialog.bot: Our address is 3600 Paradise Road, Las Vegas, NV,89169, in the United States.

dialog.user: Sure, my name is Joe Doe, 311 Street Road, New York, NY, 16383. I'll give you my credit card into as soon as I get my card.
dialog.bot: Certainly, if you can provide me with your name, full address, and credit card number, we can get a reservation ready right now!

dialog.user: I'm looking for advice on hotels in Chicago.
dialog.bot: Thank you for calling. How can I help you today.

dialog.user: As long as it's centrally located, and is modern but not snobbishly expensive.
dialog.bot: Sure, I can help you with that. Is there anything you are looking for in particular?

dialog.user: Hmm. Sounds interesting What are the rooms like?
dialog.bot: How about the Club Quarters Hotel, Wacker at Michigan?  It is contemporary hotel that combines modern aesthetic while maintaing casual vibes.

dialog.user: I am going there for work.
dialog.bot: The rooms are relaxing and well appointed. They come with an kitchenette and are equipped with a microwave and a minifridge. Of course there is coffee supplied as well.  Are you traveling for business or pleasure?

dialog.user: The place sounds great.
dialog.bot: Well, the hotel also has event space for meetings, and there is a bar onsite for winding down with clients afterwards.

dialog.user: Hi, I'm calling from JE Financial and I'm trying to find a hotel for some colleagues and I going to a conference in downtown Detroit near the Convention Center. We're flying in from California and we'll be there for four nights. None of us have been to Detroit before, so we'll need some help finding a good place for us to work and relax while we're there.
dialog.bot: Good morning, my name is Angela. How may I help you today?

dialog.user: Well, I know that, speaking for myself, I want to keep up with my exercise routine and eating habits, so perhaps a place to store some healthy food.
dialog.bot: Great, I'll be happy to help you today. I know that area well. There are lots of hotels in that area. What specifically are you looking for?

dialog.user: That sounds nice. After long days of meetings, it would be good to go back to my room for a bit and relax.
dialog.bot: I like to recommend the Detroit Marriott at the Renaissance Center to people who need to go to the Convention Center. It's very popular with business travelers like yourself. Plus it has a fitness center and a minifridge is included in all room so you can store whatever you'd like.

dialog.user: Thanks, but after spending all day with them, I'd rather just get some work done by myself in my room. And my husband and daughter may come out to visit, but we're not sure yet.
dialog.bot: Then this hotel would be perfect for you. They have recently updated the place to be more contemporary and have a relaxing touch to it. Also, if you need to meet with your co-workers, they have meeting rooms you can reserve or an on-site restaurant if you need to convene with them.

dialog.user: Thank you so much for your help today. I'd like to book that hotel. What's that address so I can send a link to my colleagues?
dialog.bot: I get it, and that works too because every room has a desk in there so you can work and coffee makers if you need extra energy. If your family does come out, there is a sofa bed in there if you need one.
Wonderful. It's the Marriott at 400 Renaissance Center in Detroit, MI 48243.

dialog.bot: Okay, I'll be happy to help you. There are plenty of resorts to stay at in that area. Since you'll have children, I like to recommend the family friendly Holiday Inn Resort Orlando-Lake Buena Vista. It has bunk beds in the rooms that are always a hit with the kids. dialog.bot: Yes, they have a fitness room. Your room will have a balcony and coffee available in all rooms, so you won't even have to leave your room! Plus with a mini fridge in each room, you can store food so you really don't have to leave.

dialog.bot: Well if you ever miss working, they do have meeting rooms if you need to get work done.

dialog.user: Wonderful. I'm really excited. Thanks again for all your help. Will you please give me the address?
dialog.bot: There is a laundry room on site, so you can get it done there before you get home.
